report.title: Cached occurrence list for location boundary
report.description: A general purpose list of records filtered to the contents of a selected location's boundary. Uses the cache tables so fast, but there is a lag before data appears.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN locations l ON st_intersects(o.public_geom, l.boundary_geom) AND l.id=#location_id# AND l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values vuser JOIN sample_attributes sauser on sauser.id=vuser.sample_attribute_id and sauser.deleted=false and sauser.system_function = 'cms_username' ) on vuser.sample_id=o.sample_id and vuser.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users ouser ON ouser.id=o.created_by_id AND ouser.id<>1 -- don't return records allocated by default to admin user #joins# WHERE #website_filter# AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(o.taxon_group_id AS character varying)='#taxon_group_id#' OR '#taxon_group_id#'='') AND o.record_status not in ('D','I','R','T') #order_by#
report.field_sql: o.id as occurrence_id, o.sample_id, o.location_name, o.public_entered_sref as entered_sref, o.date_start, o.date_end, o.date_type, o.taxa_taxon_list_id, o.preferred_taxon as taxon, o.default_common_name as common, o.taxon_group, COALESCE(vuser.text_value, ouser.username) as recorder, st_astext(o.public_geom) as geom, o.zero_abundance, o.certainty

param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
